about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Australian Premium Solar (India) Limited manufactures monocrystalline and polycrystalline solar modules and provides engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) services for residential, agricultural, and commercial applications.

The company manufactures two types of solar panels:

  1. Monocrystalline solar panels: The solar cells used in monocrystalline solar panels are more efficient and have a darker, uniform appearance due to their monocrystalline structure, allowing the busbars (copper-coated thin ribbons) to be placed more strategically without significantly detracting from the appearance.
  2. Polycrystalline solar panels: Solar cells used in polycrystalline solar panels have a blue or speckled appearance due to their multicrystalline structure; busbars may need to be positioned to accommodate the less uniform appearance of these cells.

The company also provides installation services for solar panels and solar pumps for residential and industrial end users, while it also provides installation services for solar pumps for agricultural end users.

By August 31, 2023, the company has provided more than 10,000 customers with the installation of solar panels, of which more than 9500 have been installed on the roofs of residential buildings and more than 1300 with solar pumps for agriculture.

The company's manufacturing facility is located in Sabarkantha, Gujarat, India. As at July 31, 2023, the company employed a total of 169 people.

faqs.question: What is the Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO?
faqs.answer:
Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO is a SME IPO of 5200000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹28.08 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹54 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on January 11, 2024, and closes on January 15, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO opens on January 11, 2024 and closes on January 15, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO?
faqs.answer: Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO will be done on Tuesday, January 16, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, January 17, 2024. Check the Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Australian Premium Solar (India) IPO listing date is on Thursday, January 18, 2024.
